label: Marketplace
comment: An actual or virtual place where buyers and sellers interact, directly or through intermediaries, to trade goods or services.

datatypeProperties.comment: An available ordering period for this specified marketplace.
The code specifying a sales method, such as an auction clock or mediation, for this specified marketplace.
The indication of whether or not this specified marketplace is virtual, such as a web-based marketplace.
A website Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for this specified marketplace.

referencedBy.comment: A marketplace included in this line trade agreement.
